ability.Concussive Roar: Damage from any of this Pokemon's sound-based moves is calculated as physical attacks. Sound-based moves have a 30% chance to flinch the opponents.
ability.Absolute Power: Increases the power of physical moves (including the sound-based moves) by 30% but lowers the accuracy by 10 points.

Flare Blitz.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Bulk Up.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Ice Spinner.effect: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
